title: Remodeled 1 Bed w/ Washer/Dryer in unit & Deck **Video Tour**
posting_body: ['SoMA:', 'Remodeled 1 Bed w/ Washer/Dryer in unit & Deck', 'Property Address', '64 Langton St. | San Francisco, CA 94103', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'SF City Rents, PC |', 'show contact info', 'Description', '**You can watch a video walkthrough of the actual apartment here: <URL>', '**To schedule an in-person tour at your preferred times, go to: <URL>', 'Check out this hidden gem on a quiet alley off of Howard Street, and just few blocks from countless shops, restaurants and bars!', 'Features include:', '- Lower flat in a 4 unit building', '- Deck right outside your back door', '- Washer/dryer in unit!', '- Expansive great room that can accommodate living/dining/office furniture', '- Stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher', '- Hardwood floors throughout', '- Spacious bedroom with plenty of space for all your bedroom furniture + a window seat', 'Location:', '- ONLY 3 blocks to Civic Center BART/MUNI station', "- Close to everything, including AMC theater, Target, Trader Joe's, Union Square shopping area, Westfield Shopping Center, and lots of nice restaurants", '- Walking distance to Financial District, Union Square, and Downtown', '- Easy access to 280 and 101 freeways', 'Lease Terms:', '- 12 month lease, then rent-controlled on a month-to-month basis', '- Pets considered on a case by case basis with additional deposit', '- Non-smoking unit', 'We look forward to showing you this apartment!', 'SF City Rents', 'DRE# 02187202 (please don’t use the DRE# to request a showing; instead provide the property address: 64 Langton)', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.', 'Amenities', 'Remodeled Kitchen', 'Laundry in unit', 'Shared Deck', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,495.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $40.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed on a case by case basis', 'Dogs allowed on a case by case basis']
